about.title: The Intersection of the Racetrack and Code
about.p1: My career is defined by a relentless pursuit of <1>performance</1>. I learned in motorsport that victory lies in the details, in the data, and in the ability to innovate under pressure. Today, I apply that same mentality to building software.
about.p2: As a Full-Stack Developer and Data Engineer, my mission is to create the tools that transform <1>complex data into a competitive advantage</1>. I don't just analyze data—I build the end-to-end systems that collect, process, and reveal the hidden performance that leads to success.
about.stat1: Members Led in the FSAE Project

expertise.title: Areas of <accent>Expertise</accent>
expertise.subtitle: My approach to building innovative solutions, combining software development, data analysis, and systems engineering.

tabs.fullstack_desc: I design and develop end-to-end applications, from robust APIs in Node.js and Python to reactive interfaces with React. My experience translates into systems like telemetry dashboards and cross-platform productivity applications, always with a focus on clean code, scalability, and performance.
tabs.data_desc: I specialize in the entire data lifecycle: from acquisition in highly complex environments (telemetry) to the creation of processing pipelines and the application of predictive models with Scikit-learn. I transform raw data into interactive dashboards that reveal strategic insights.
tabs.iot_desc: I design and implement hardware and software solutions for real-time data collection. I have hands-on experience with ESP32, Raspberry Pi, and LoRa communication to ensure data integrity and transmission in environments with high electromagnetic interference, such as motorsport.
tabs.leadership_desc: I led a technical team of 42 members in the Formula SAE project, achieving a 12-position jump in the national ranking. I am adept at problem-solving under pressure and have effective communication skills to align technical objectives with project strategy in multiple languages.

projects.title: Projects in the <accent>Spotlight</accent>
projects.subtitle: A selection of works that demonstrate my passion for solving complex problems with technology and data.

telemetry.title: IoT Telemetry System for Formula SAE
telemetry.description: Complete IoT system for real-time telemetry, using ESP32 and LoRa in the vehicle and a base station with Raspberry Pi and a Flask API for data processing and storage in MySQL. The cross-platform graphical interface was developed in Python with PySide6 (Qt) for performance visualization and analysis.

captain.title: Captain and Systems Engineer (UTForce E-Racing)
captain.description: I led the construction of the electric car prototype, being responsible for the high-voltage system, diagnosis and repair of the BMS (Battery Management System), and for the general assembly and integration. I secured a strategic sponsorship for essential components, culminating in the delivery of a fully functional vehicle.

tires.title: Tire Management System (Motorsport)
tires.description: Desktop application (PySide6) for tire management and setup analysis in motorsport. The system calculates pressure corrections, exports reports, and visualizes the car's stiffness distribution with heatmaps, aiding in strategic decision-making.

commandCenter.title: Personal Command Center
commandCenter.description: Cross-platform desktop productivity application (Win/Mac/Linux) with a modular architecture, built with Electron.js, Node.js, and React. It includes modules for finance, tasks, gamified goals, and health, with dynamic charts and native notifications.

pokemon.title: Pokémon Data Analysis System
pokemon.description: A Full Stack application (Ionic/Angular) that transforms a Pokédex into a data analysis platform. It collects and processes metrics from 1000+ Pokémon, including stats, metadata, and user behavior, using custom webhooks, LRU cache, and RxJS data streaming for real-time UX optimization.

webTelemetry.title: Web Telemetry Dashboard
webTelemetry.description: Web application for real-time telemetry data analysis and visualization, with a Python/Flask backend and an interactive frontend built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Chart.js for dynamic charts.
